segments.text: It's a quiet kitchen scene, or at least it should be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are two children by the cupboards, quite busy with something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on a stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to get those cookies out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is looking up expectantly, hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share, a true partner in crime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort between them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how determined they are to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really love cookies to go to all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've chosen their moment perfectly, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood mischief scenario playing out right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
